author: elecharny
msg: o Fixed the way the Transport acceptor is created : if the constructor does not create it, it is created when setting the Transport(). This is mandatory to avoid using a constructor injection in Spring
o Switch Kerberos tests to Junit 4.4
o Disposing acceptors when done with the transport, otherwise we get some 'Too many open files' exceptions
